00020 #ifndef _BOARD_H_
00021 #define _BOARD_H_
00022 
00023 /* This is the processor pinout and what is connected to each pin 
00024  * =====================================================================================
00025  * 
00026  * JP2 header pinout (ISP header)
00027  * =====================================================================================
00028  * This header can be used either to program the device (pin compatible with AVR ISP)
00029  * or you can use it to communicate with other hardware devices via SPI. I would suggest
00030  * that you use PB4 in that case as the chip select pin.
00031  *
00032  *  -----
00033  * o|1 2|
00034  *  |3 4|
00035  *  |5 6|
00036  *  -----
00037  *
00038  *  Pin 1 = SPI MISO
00039  *  Pin 2 = NC
00040  *  Pin 3 = SPI SCK
00041  *  Pin 4 = SPI MOSI
00042  *  Pin 5 = uC RESET
00043  *  Pin 6 = GND
00044  * =====================================================================================
00045  *
00046  * 
00047  * PORTA
00048  * =====================================================================================
00049  * PA0 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB7
00050  * PA1 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB6
00051  * PA2 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB5
00052  * PA3 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB4
00053  * PA4 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB3
00054  * PA5 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB2
00055  * PA6 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB1
00056  * PA7 - Output - LCD DATA PIN DB0
00057  * =====================================================================================
00058  *
00059  *
00060  * PORTB
00061  * =====================================================================================
00062  * PB0 - Output - POWER LED #2
00063  * PB1 - Output - POWER LED #3
00064  * PB2 - Output - POWER LED #4
00065  * PB3 - Output - POWER LED #5
00066  * PB4 - Output - POWER LED #6
00067  * PB5 - Output - POWER LED #7
00068  * PB6 - Output - POWER LED #8
00069  * PB7 - Output - POWER LED #9
00070  * =====================================================================================
00071  *
00072  *
00073  * PORTC
00074  * =====================================================================================
00075  * PC0 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #2
00076  * PC1 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #3
00077  * PC2 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #4
00078  * PC3 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #5
00079  * PC4 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #6
00080  * PC5 - Output - LCD PIN RS
00081  * PC6 - Output - LCD PIN RW
00082  * PC7 - Output - LCD PIN ENABLE
00083  * =====================================================================================
00084  *
00085  *
00086  * PORTD
00087  * =====================================================================================
00088  * PD0 - I/O    - I2C SCL
00089  * PD1 - I/O    - I2C SDA
00090  * PD2 - Input  - USB RXD       (RXD 1)
00091  * PD3 - Output - USB TXD       (TXD 1)
00092  * PD4 - Input  - Divided frequency input
00093  * PD5 - Output - POWER LED #12
00094  * PD6 - Output - POWER LED #13
00095  * PD7 - Output - POWER LED #14
00096  * =====================================================================================
00097  *
00098  *
00099  * PORTE
00100  * =====================================================================================
00101  * PE0 - Input  - PDI
00102  * PE1 - Output - PDO
00103  * PE2 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #7
00104  * PE3 - Output - PWM output for display backlight (OC3A)
00105  * PE4 - Output - PWM output for display contrast  (OC3B)
00106  * PE5 - Input  - Pulse sensor pin #1
00107  * PE6 - Input  - Pulse sensor pin #2
00108  * PE7 - Output - POWER LED #1
00109  * =====================================================================================
00110  *
00111  *
00112  * PORTF
00113  * =====================================================================================
00114  * PF0 - Input  - A/D input, forward voltage (power)
00115  * PF1 - Input  - A/D input, reflected voltage
00116  * PF2 - Output - RELAY #1
00117  * PF3 - Output - Counter clear
00118  * PF4 - Output - RELAY #2
00119  * PF5 - Input  - Menu button
00120  * PF6 - 
00121  * PF7 - 
00122  * =====================================================================================
00123  *
00124  *
00125  * PORTG
00126  * =====================================================================================
00127  * PG0 - Output - POWER LED #15
00128  * PG1 - Output - Reflected POWER LED #1
00129  * PG2 - Output - VSWR warning LED
00130  * PG3 - Output - POWER LED #10
00131  * PG4 - Output - POWER LED #11
00132  * =====================================================================================
00133  *
00134  */
00135 
00136 /* PORTE */
00137 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT0      7
00138 /* PORTB */
00139 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT1      0
00140 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT2      1
00141 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT3      2
00142 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT4      3
00143 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT5      4
00144 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT6      5
00145 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT7      6
00146 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT8      7
00147 /* PORTG */
00148 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT9      3
00149 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT10     4
00150 /* PORTD */
00151 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT11     5
00152 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT12     6
00153 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT13     7
00154 /* PORTG */
00155 #define LED_FWD_POWER_BIT14     0
00156 
00157 /* PORTG */
00158 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT0      1
00159 /* PORTC */
00160 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT1      0
00161 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT2      1
00162 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT3      2
00163 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT4      3
00164 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT5      4
00165 /* PORTE */
00166 #define LED_REF_POWER_BIT6      2
00167 
00168 /* PORTG */
00169 #define LED_VSWR_ALARM_BIT      2
00170 
00171 /* PORTF */
00172 #define RELAY1_BIT      2
00173 #define RELAY2_BIT      4
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177 #endif
